title: Stan Wawrinka's Final Tennis Adventure
summary: Stan Wawrinka is a famous tennis player from Switzerland who has won three big tournaments called Grand Slams. He has decided that 2026 will be his last year playing tennis professionally. Wawrinka is 40 years old and has had a great career, beating top players like Novak Djokovic and Rafael Nadal. He also won a gold medal at the Olympics with Roger Federer. Wawrinka says he still has dreams and wants to finish his career on a high note. He will start his final year at a team competition in Perth in January 2026. This is like the last chapter of a book for him, and he is excited to play for fans around the world one more time.

Now, at age 40, he has decided to stop playing after 2026 because he wants to finish his career while still enjoying the sport and playing for fans.
